discussiontools-autotopicsubpopup-body: Ị ga-anata ozi mgbe mmadụ tinyere okwu ọhụụ n'ebe akpamnkata. Ị nwere ike idozi ebe ọkwa nnata ozi gi ebe mmasị gị.
discussiontools-autotopicsubpopup-prefer: Dezie ebe mmasị dị iche iche
discussiontools-desc: Ngwa iji kwalite ibe mkparịta ụka.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-talkpages}}|Ibe nkata]] bụ ebe ndị mmadụ na-akpa nkata otu ihe dị na {{SITENAME}} ga-esi bụrụ ọkacha mma. Ị nwere ike gị na ndị ọzọ ebido ịkpa nkata otu a ga-esi kwalite [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}]].
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self: Ndị nọ na{{SITENAME}} nwere ike iji  [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|ibe nkata a]] wee gosi oha ozi gị, a ga-ezitere gi ozi mgbe ha mere nke a.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self-ano:
Ndị nọ na {{SITENAME}} ga eji [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage-anon}}|ibe nkata a]] wee zie ọha mmadụ  ọzị maka ndezi eji IP Adịresị iji arụ ọrụ ugbu a.

Ọtụtụ IP adịresị na-agbanwe mgbe ụfọdụ, ma ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-eji ya. Ị nwere ike  [$1 keputa akaụntu] maọbụ [$2 banye] iji gbochie mgbagwoju anya n'ọdị n'ihu n'etiti ndị pụgoro n'ebe ndebanye ihe. Ị mepụta akaụntu na-ezokwa IP adịresị gị.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|Talk pages]] bụ ebe ndị mmadụ na-akpa otu aga-esi mee ihe ndịna dị na {{SITENAME}} ka ọ bụrụ ọ kacha mma. Bido nkata ọhụụ iji nwee mmekọọ maọbụ jikọọ {{GENDER:{{PAGENAME}}|with}} [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}|{{PAGENAME}}]]. Ihe ọ bụla ị kwuru ebe a, onye ọbụla ga-ahụ ya.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user-ano: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage-anon}}|Talk pages]] Nke a bụ ebe ndị mmadụ na-akpa ka aga-esi mee ihe ndịna dị na {{SITENAME}} ka ọ maa mma. Were ihu akwukwọ a bido mkparịtaụka banyere ndezi eji IP adiresị gị wee mee. Ihe ọ bụla ị kwuru ebe a ga-adị ebe onye ọbụla ga-ahụ ya. Ọtụtụ IP adiresị na-agbanwe ugboro ugboro, ma ọtụtụ mmadụ na-eji ya arụ ọrụ.
discussiontools-emptystate-title-self: Nnọọ n'ihu akwụkwọ gị maka ị gwa gị okwu
discussiontools-emptystate-title-self-an: Nnọọ n'ihu akwụkwụ nke ịgwa mmadụ okwu
discussiontools-emptystate-title-user-an: Nnọọ n'ihu akwụkwọ agwam mmadụ okwu
discussiontools-error-comment-conflict: E nweghị ike ịchekwa ihe ị kwuru makana onye ọzọ ekwuola oge ị chọrọ i kwu nke gị. Biko kwuo ọzọ, maọbụ buputagharịa ihu akwụkwọ ije hụ okwu ikpeazu e kwuru
discussiontools-error-comment-disappeare: Ị hụghị okwu ị na-azaghachị n'ihu akwụkwọ a. Ọ nwere ike ọ bụrụ na ehichala ya maọbụ wega ya n'ihu akwụkwọ ọzọ.
discussiontools-error-comment-is-transcl: Agaghị enwe ike iji nkokọ a"{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}" wee zaghachi okwu a. Iji zaghachi okwu a biko were otu ibe akwụkwọ eji eme ndezi site n'ịpị aka na "$1".
Agaghị eji nkokọ nke a "{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}" azaghachi okwu a maka na-esi n'ihu akwụkwọ ọzọ weta ya. Ị ịzaghachi biko gaa na ebe a: [[$1]]
discussiontools-error-comment-not-saved: Agaghị enwe ike ibipụta ihe ị dere n'ihu akwụkwọ nke ọhụụ. I ji hụụ mgbanwe ọhuụ, kọpịrị ihe ị dere tinye ma  browza  ka o wee buputagharịa ihu akwụkọ a ọzọ.
discussiontools-error-lint: Agaghị enwe ike ịzaghachi ihe ndị e  kwuru n'ihu akwụkwọ a n'ihi enwere ndeghe na Wikitext. Ị nwere ike ịmụta maka ndeghe site [$1 reading the documentation], jụọ maka enye m aka site [$2 posting here] maọbụ ịdezi ndeghe a site [$3 opening the full page editor].
discussiontools-error-noswitchtove: Ewela iwe ngafe na nadezi nke ana-ahụ anya adịghi ugbu a n'ihi na-achọpụtar na $1 dị n'ihe ị kwuru/dere. [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:DiscussionTools/Reply_tool_visual_mode_limitations Learn more].
discussiontools-error-noswitchtove-title: Usoro ndezi nke an-ahụ anya adịghị
discussiontools-limitreport-errorreqid: Akọrọngwa eji akpa nkata adịghị mma nata ikike
discussiontools-limitreport-timeusage: Oge iji Akọrọngwa eji akpa nkata
discussiontools-newtopic-legacy-hint: Ụzọ ọhụụ iji bido isiokwu dị ebe a. Mmelite a ga-enyere gị aka ịtinye isiokwu site n'iji ụdị usoro dị iche ma were ụzọ mkpirisi ọhụụ mee ka ndị ọzọ mara . Ị nwekwara ike [$1 switch back to the legacy experience].
discussiontools-newtopic-legacy-hint-ret: Ugbu a ị na-ahụ arụmarụ nketa. ị nwere ike [$1 return to the new experience] maọbụ jee hụ nke mmasịrị gị ị ji wee [$2 set the legacy experience as your default].
discussiontools-newtopic-missing-title: Biko wepụta isiokwu ihe ị na-ekwu/ede maka ya. Ọbụrụ na -ịpịa aka na {{int:discussiontools-replywidget-newtopic}}" A ga-agbakwụnye ihe ị dere/kwuru na-enweghị isiokwu.
discussiontools-notification-removed-top: E nwere ike, I gaghizi anata ozi gbasara {{PLURAL:$1| isiokwu a|isiokwu ndị a}}.
Edobere ma ọ bụ wepụ isiokwu " $4 " pụọ ná $3 .
Kwụsị ịnata amamọkwa dị ka nke a
Ị gaghị enweta ọkwa ọzọ mgbe edokwara ma ọ bụ wepụ isiokwu.
discussiontools-preference-autotopicsub: Denye aha gi ozigbo maka isiokwu
discussiontools-preference-autotopicsub-: Mgbe ị bidoro nkata ọhụụ maọbụ okwu ọhụụ n'ebe ebere maka ikpa nkata, ị ga-enweta ozi ozigbo iji gwa gị ndị ọzọ dere okwu ọhụụ
discussiontools-preference-description:
Nye ikike maka njirimara ihu akwụkwọ ebe nnwale ikwu okwu:
* [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Talk_pages_project/Replying Reply] site na-ịpị ya aka otu ugboro.
* [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Talk_pages_project/New_discussion Add new topics] jiri njirimara ya.
* [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Talk_pages_project/Notifications Receive notifications] mgbe ọbụla etinyere okwu ọhụụ ebe i tinyere aha gị maka nnata ozi.

Ịnwere ike itinye ihe nriba ama na [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-editing-discussion|preferences]].

A ga-etinye ihe nkwalite na [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Talk_pages_project/Updates talk pages project's updates page].

Biko Ọkwa dị mkpa:
* ọtụtụ ugboro a ga-na-agbakwụnye  ihe ọrụ nnwale.
* Ụfọdụ ihe njirimara na-egosi n'elu agaghị enweike ịpụta na wiki kitaa.
discussiontools-preference-newtopictool-: Nke a ga-egosi gị usoro ntinye isiokwu ọhụụ
discussiontools-preference-replytool-hel: Nke a ga-egosi gị nkokọ ị ga eji zaghachi ozi site n'otu mpị aka
discussiontools-preference-sourcemodetoo: ikike akọrọngwa ndezi ka dị na isi iyi/isi ebe nweta
Nke a ga-etinye akọrọngwa toolbar maka nzaghachi ozi ozigbo ozigbo nakwa ntinye njirimara isiokwu ozigbo ozigbo, isi ebe nweta gbakwụnyere ụzọ mkpirisi maka itinye nkokọ
discussiontools-preference-summary: Ị nwere ike ịmụ maka atụmatụ ndị a site n'ịgụ [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Talk_pages_project/Feature_summary feature summary].
discussiontools-preference-topicsubscrip: mee ka ndenye aha isiokwu nwee ikike
Nke a ga- eme ka i nwee ike idenye aha iji nata ọkwa/ozi maka onye kwuru ihe ọ bụla gbasara isiokwu di iche iche
discussiontools-replywidget-abandon: Odoro gị anya na ị chọrọ ịtufu ihe ị kwuru ị na-ede?
discussiontools-replywidget-abandontopic: O doro gị na ị chọrọ itufu isiokwu ị na-ede?
discussiontools-replywidget-anon-warning: Ị banyela. I ji were aha gị nata njirimara karịa iji adịresị IP, Ị nwere ike [$1 log in] maọbụ [$2 create an account].
discussiontools-replywidget-feedback: Kesaa ozi nzighachi maka njirimara a
discussiontools-replywidget-signature-bo:
Agbanweela $1 n'ime mbinyeaka gị. Iji megharịa nke a, pinye $2. 
Matakwa na itosịghị iji akọrọnwga a wee ibinye aka n'ihe e kwuru. A ga-etinye mbinye aka gị ozigbo
discussiontools-replywidget-terms-click: Site na-ịpị "$1"aka, ị kwetala n'usoro okwu iji nke a na Wiki a
discussiontools-replywidget-transcluded: A ga-echekwa ihe ị kwuru na [[$1]].
discussiontools-replywidget-watchthis: Gbakwunye ihu akwụkwọ a na [[Special:Watchlist|watchlist]] gị
discussiontools-target-comment-missing: E nweghị ike ihụ okwu a. O nwere ike ọ bụrụ na-ehichapụla ya maọbụ bugharịa ya.
discussiontools-target-comments-missing: Enweghị ike ihụ okwu ọhụụ. O nwere ike bụrụ na-ehichapụla ya maọbụ bugharịa ya.
discussiontools-topicsubscription-action: Wepụ aha gi na nnataozi gbasara isiokwu a
discussiontools-topicsubscription-button: Tinye aha gị maka nnata ozi
Tinye aha gị maka nnata ozi banyere okwu ọhụụ
Wepụ aha iji kwụsị nnata ozi
discussiontools-topicsubscription-error-: Ahụghị aha nnata ozi egosiri na URL
discussiontools-topicsubscription-notify: Ị ga-anata ọkwa maka okwu ọhụụ n'isiokwu a
Ị gaghị anata ọkwa ozi ọzọ maka okwu ọhụụ n'isiokwu a
discussiontools-topicsubscription-specia:
Ị denye aha ga-ekwe ka ị soro n'isiokwu a na-akpa maka ya n'ihu akwụkwọ akpamnkata. Mgbe ọbụla mmadụ zaghachiri isiokwu, ị ga-enweta ozi.

Dozie otu na ebe ị ga-enweta ozi ndị a na [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-echo|your preferences]].
echo-category-title-dt-subscription: Ihu akwụkwọ i kwu okwu/mmarịta ụka {{PLURAL:$1|subscription|subscriptions}}
echo-pref-tooltip-dt-subscription: Mee ka m mara mgbe mmadụ zitere okwu ọhụụ n'isiokwu m tinyere aha m
tag-discussiontools-added-comment-descri: E tinyere okwu na ndezi a
tag-discussiontools-description: Ndezi eji akọrọngwa mkparịta ụka mee
tag-discussiontools-edit-description: onye ọrụ ji akọrọngwa mkparịta ụka dezie okwu di adị
tag-discussiontools-newtopic-description: Onye ọrụ ji akọrọngwa mkparịta ụka tinye isiokwu ọhụụ
tag-discussiontools-reply-description: Onye ọrụ ji akọrọngwa mkparịta ụka wee zaghachi okwu
tag-discussiontools-source-description: Akọrọngwa mkparịta ụka dị mode nsinweta
tag-discussiontools-source-enhanced-desc: Akọrọngwa mkparịta ụka di na mode nsinweta ya na toolbar
